title: Holly Willoughby slays as Harley Quinn for Celebrity Juice
text:
Holly Willoughby slays as Harley Quinn for Celebrity Juice Halloween special (Picture: Instagram)

Holly Willoughby dressed up as Harley Quinn once again for Halloween and she’s absolutely killed it.

She chose the DC comics villain as her fancy dress of choice for Celebrity Juice’s Halloween special and it’s safe to say the look was a hit.

Holly took inspo from Harley Quinn’s new look she debuts in upcoming movie Birds Of Prey.

Margot Robbie is back as the Suicide Squad character, but ditches her saucy baseball attire for a jazzy new ribboned coat, denim hotpants and short blunt pigtails with her trademark blue and pink dip dye.

And anything Harley can do, well Holly can do better.

She worked Harley’s new look for her Celeb Juice appearance and honestly it had us all like, ‘Margot, is that you?’.

Advertisement

Advertisement

Sharing a boomerang of her in character, Holly told fans: ‘Halloween on @celebjuiceofficial … this Thursday @itv2 10pm… Back in the Harley Quinn.’

She also posed for a selfie with Keith Lemon, which he shared with followers, and we seriously applaud their dress up efforts.

Holly posed alongside Keith Lemon ahead of filming (Picture: Instagram)

Ever the funny man, Keith joked: ‘Hours of prosthetic make-up. @hollywilloughby as Bram Stokers Dracula and me as Holly dressed as Harley Quim @celebjuiceofficial #halloweenspecial Thursday 31st 10pm @itv2.’

And it’s actually not the first time Holly has channeled her inner Harley Quinn, as she first dressed up as her for Celebrity Juice back in 2016.

Holly is a team captain on the ITV2 show, which used to star her BFF Fearne Cotton, before Fearne chose to quit in December last year.

She was originally replaced by Paddy McGuinness, but Mel B has since taken over as Paddy was forced to leave over ‘scheduling conflicts’.

Celebrity Juice airs Thursday at 10pm on ITV2.

description: Holly Willoughby dresses up as Harley Quinn for Celebrity Juice's Halloween special.
